title: Wangscape tilesets schema
description: Specifies the contents and locations of Wangscape output tilesets.

items.title: Tileset schema
items.description: Specifies the terrains, filename, resolution, and tile resolution of a Wangscape output tileset.

resolution.title: Tile resolution schema
resolution.description: Specifies the resolution of tiles in the tileset.

filename.title: Tileset filename schema
filename.description: Specifies the filename of the image containing the tileset.

x.title: Tileset x resolution schema
x.description: Specifies the horizontal resolution of the whole tileset.

y.title: Tileset y resolution schema
y.description: Specifies the vertical resolution of the whole tileset.

terrains.title: Tileset terrains schema
terrains.description: Specifies the IDs of the terrain types used in the tileset.
